How are you feeling, Mr. Kakyoin?
I have never been without my vision before, so it is a bit unsettling.
I think the painkillers are working.
Doctor, when do you think I can take off these bandages?
I do not have any time to waste.
Mr. Kakyoin, while your eye injuries are not life-threatening,
I am afraid we will not be able to discharge you anytime soon.
To be honest, I cannot even give you an estimate.
It is true that you will need time to heal.
for some reason, we were contacted by doctors from the Speedwagon Foundation.
They asked that we put you in their care.
I am sure you will recover much more quickly.
So exactly who are you, anyway?
I do not think they would get involved with an ordinary high school student.
I have an acquaintance who is very reliable, that is all.
I might be able to join you sooner than I expected.
This is Luxor, a city about halfway up the Nile.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
In ancient times, it was called Thebes.
Far to the west of the Nile,
there lies a valley where the pharaohs of old were laid to rest.
This is the Valley of the Kings.
The tomb of the famous King Tutankhamun lies in the Valley of the Kings.
Wow, so this place is pretty historical.
Apparently, there are still people who
dig underneath their houses in secret to the government,
hoping to find gold and treasure.
I wonder if there are still any tombs or treasures left to be found.
By the way, where did the old man go?
Iggy's with him, so if anything seems odd, they will notice.
Do you need to go, too?
If it is a real bathroom, sure.
The air's so dry, the poop turns into dust and flies away.
So instead of using water, this toilet uses the wind?
Could this be a sand washlet?!
You clean your ass... with sand?!
I am not Polnareff, but I think I will wait until we are at the hotel.
With a bathroom like that, I might as well just go behind a rock.
That is a strange sight to see in Egypt.
Why is there an electrical outlet in this rock?
What would you even use it for?
It is not like it could be wired to anything.
Mr. Joestar, what is the matter?
We are going to head out soon.
But what a surprise that was...
Since there is power running to it,
does that mean they have electricity around here?
Her card represents the Goddess Bastet.
You always want to touch what is off-limits.
We could make it to Cairo in two days, but we are all injured.
Why do not we spend tonight and tomorrow in Luxor to take a break?
Ever since we got to Egypt,
the enemy Stands have been getting stronger.
We have just barely been winning.
Hey, Mr. Joestar, is something wrong?
My prosthetic hand's been acting up.
Well, I am sure the joints just need oiling.
It is made in Japan, and I just bought it...
We should probably rest up before we enter Cairo.
But we cannot let our guard down.
Slamming that hammer around is dangerous.
Polnareff is fussing about getting breakfast somewhere.
Hurry and wake him up, Avdol!
Tell him to be down here in five minutes!
Most old people wake up early in the morning.
Tell him I will be right down.
For a man of your age, your sleeping habits are quite amazing.
You have turned a full 180 degrees.
You fell asleep facing south, but now you are facing north.
Perhaps that proves you are still young?
Something strange has been going on since last night...
And my prosthetic hand's still acting up.
Wh-What is wrong with this chair?!
It is moving on its own!
Could it be that the whole floor is not level?
This was a pricey hotel, but it must have been built on the cheap.
The Karnak Temple was amazing, so I would say something like that.
It is a bit far, but how about the Valley of the Queens?
What the hell are you doing, you dirty old man?!
I-I have no idea what is going on...
Something has seemed off since last night!
All of this metal is sticking to me...
Steel is fixing itself to my body!
Could it be that my body...
Has it turned into a magnet?!
Could it be a new Stand?
Why cannot I see the Stand?
Why are the knives and forks flying at me without a Stand around?
Has the shock from that rock turned my body into a magnet?
The escalator is made of steel!
And the magnetism is getting stronger by the minute!
Your chain's gotten tangled around my hands and body,
and it is getting dragged into the ramp!
Push the emergency stop button at the bottom of the escalator!
At this rate, your chains will get dragged in,
and they will chop my hands and feet off!
Once you are ensnared by my Stand Bastet's magnetic energy,
there is no way to break the spell.
I will push the emergency stop button...
Th-The emergency stop button is not there?!
It is going to cut my head off!
It is going to cut my head off!
I pushed the emergency stop button.
This escalator inspection has found no problems!
The stop button works just fine!
Hey, are you from the hotel?
Could you sign off on the inspection?
What are you talking about, Mr. Joestar?!
I am under the spell of an enemy Stand.
My body is like a magnet now...
She turned me into a magnet!
And the magnetic force keeps getting stronger...
We have to stop her magnetism at once,
or it will get so strong, I will not be able to move!
Let us go get Jotaro and Polnareff!
We cannot wait on Jotaro and Polnareff!
I will at least get a look at her face!
Sh-She went into the women's restroom.
I am going to catch that woman, no matter what!
The old man's not here yet?
Avdol went to get him, and he is not back, either...
went to eat something super-delicious without us?!
He is just taking his time in the restroom.
If they do not show up in the next five minutes, we will go look for them.
Come to think of it, the toilets in this hotel were so clean...
Mr. Joestar, it is good that we came in here...
But as I expected, most of the stalls are in use.
You will know right away if you spot them.
W-We are going to look in?
You are the wonderful man I met earlier.
You came all the way here this time?
How could you screw that up?!
This is not in line with my image!
It is a peeping old man!
When did she get over there?!
A-Avdol, I forgot to tell you earlier,
but do not touch anything that looks like an electrical outlet.
Do not touch it, no matter where it is!
You will feel like you have been shocked, and then the magnetism starts!
I am afraid I have touched it, Mr. Joestar.
When I pushed the emergency stop button at the escalator...
There was an outlet nearby, and it shocked me.
M-Mr. Joestar, please do not run so close to me.
It is hard to move with you stuck to me.
You are the one getting closer!
To think that my body, too, would become a magnet...
My body, too, became a magnet...
We are both in her power now.
I have never backed down from a fight!
